entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a character who laughed and remembered stabbing the diary.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as a character who explained how Horcruxes work.

entities.name: horcrux
entities.description: Horcrux is mentioned as a magical object that contains a fragment of soul.

entities.name: diary
entities.description: The diary is mentioned as a Horcrux that was destroyed by Harry.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort's soul is mentioned as being trapped in the diary.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as a character who tried to get rid of the diary before Harry did.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as a character who asked how the bit of soul in the diary worked.

relationships.description: The diary contains a fragment of Voldemort's soul.
Ginny was possessed by the bit of soul in the diary.
Harry destroyed the diary, which caused the bit of soul trapped in it to cease existing.
A Horcrux contains a fragment of soul.
